reviewText: NoAngels acts like a reality show of these women creating a nude website.  The main actress a former Penthouse Pet is very hot and we get to see her in all her glory several times.  She does do one boy/girl scene but in the end we dont't get much.  There is way to much dialogue and not enough action.  This dvd will leave you wanting more.  Diary of Lust is just to edited to enjoy.  Susan Featherly is never given a chance to get hot.  Overall not very hot.  Phatom Love surprised me a little.  Griffin Drew looks great and her girl/girl scene with a maid is very hot and both ladies get into it.  We get full frontal of Griffin on several occasions.  The other scenes are ok nothing great.  Hidden Beauties is a pretty hot movie and the best of the bunch.  The movie starts with a four way (boy/girl/girl/girl).  Catalina Larranaga gets most of the time here and she looks great and gives us a nice prolonged shower scene.  Michelle Hall is a gorgeous giel but we get only one boy girl scene and it is outdoors and no greatg angles are given.  The hidden beauties have one boy/girl and one girl/girl.  The girl/girl scene is hot with some great petting.  By far the best in this pack.  If there is a true unedited version watch it!
